com.escape.games.model
Class InterleavedVertexGeometry

java.lang.Object
  com.escape.games.model.Geometry
      com.escape.games.model.InterleavedVertexGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequireResourceLoader
public class InterleavedVertexGeometry
extends Geometry

Represents packed interleaved vertex attributes. Vertex Attributes must be in the order {Position, Normal, Color, Texture} and only Position is required.

Author:
escape-llc

Constructor Detail

InterleavedVertexGeometry

protected InterleavedVertexGeometry(int et,
                                    float[] vas,
                                    int[] elems)
Ctor. Vertex Attributes must be in the order {Position, Normal, Color, Texture} Each position of the elems array indicates the number of elements for that component (P/N/C/T). Vertex attributes must be packed according to values in elems[]. Example: a fully-populated vertex attribute array would be {x,y,z, nx,ny,nz, cr,cg,cb,ca, tx,ty} The corresponding elems[] would be { 3, 3, 4, 2 }. Example: a partially-populated vertex attribute array with (P/T) would be {x,y,z, tx,ty} The corresponding elems[] would be { 3, 0, 0, 2 }.

Parameters:
et - GL element type.
vas - Vertex Attributes in the order {Position, Normal, Color, Texture}
elems - Array of elements-per-component; use 0 to indicate not-present.

InterleavedVertexGeometry

protected InterleavedVertexGeometry(float[] vas,
                                    int[] elems)
Ctor. Use when element type is TRIANGLES.

Parameters:
vas - Vertex Attributes in the order {Position, Normal, Color, Texture}
elems - Array of elements-per-component; use 0 to indicate not-present.

InterleavedVertexGeometry

protected InterleavedVertexGeometry(float[] vas)
Ctor. Use when element type is TRIANGLES AND all attributes are present with default dimensions {3,3,4,2}.

Parameters:
vas - Vertex Attributes in the order {Position, Normal, Color, Texture}
